name: Eternal Eclipse (itch)
description:
Designed for Brackey's Game Jam 2018. Theme: Light https://itch.io/jam/brackeys

Use Arrow Keys or "A"/"D" to move left and right.

Disclaimer:
On the second day of this Game Jam I caught the flu and have been in bed since. 
Unfortunately, I was not able to finish the game to its full potential. I plan to finish it once I have recovered. 

Thank you for understanding.

-Waldo
